data.name: Wonderbirds
data.detailed_description:
This world is in danger. The islands go under water. The birdfolk have flown away.
But the eggs of unhatched nestlings remained on these islands.

Only our heroes can save everyone.
The five Wonderbirds will pass through all adventures, fight off predatory animals and save poor feather kids.

Wonderbirds, save the wonderful nestlings!



Wonderbirds is an action puzzle game in the spirit of the old Lemmings.
The chicks hatch from the eggs on the islands and start walking towards the rescue airship. On the way they will have many predators.
You play as a miracle bird that can make paths or dig channels. So you can pave the way for the chicks, make it safer. You can also stun predators, block their way. Being close to the chicks, you take them under protection. Different miracle birds also have different magical abilities that will allow the chicks to get out of this mess faster.

  • Five characters
  • Five main biomes
  • Dozens of NPC types
  • Different gameplay - from hurricane action to think a liittle puzzles

Have a good game!

data.short_description: Meet new Lemmings that meets Xonix. Escort dozens of nestlings to save them from the global flood and furious predators. Use your magic wisely and carefully. Coop with your friends and family to have more fun.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/Vista/8/10
  • Processor: 2.66 GHz Intel Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB DirectX 9 compatible video card with support for shader model 3.0
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
